Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Always a winner! Definitely a when Tony makes you bagels for you 😋 A MUST WHEN IN AMSTERDAM!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Real amazing bagel, fair prices. I got my bagel warm and toasted with cream cheese and avocado, which they put lots. Definitely going there again!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text:
The bagels here are so delicious. They even have vegan options. They put effort in it and serve them perfectly.
We ate here 2 days in a row.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Love it! The best tuna melt bagel in town! The cinnamon bun is also great.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Tony's offers a nice selection of coffees, plenty options to choose from for bagels and many lovely cakes and delicious bakery stuff to enjoy for brunch or breakfast! I'd absolutely recommend their cinnamon buns!!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text:
Very good coffee, very good bagels (take Tony's Warm Omelet Bagel, its fantastic)
Also their cinnamon buns are incredible. And you wont even spent too much money. 5 stars for this place

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: A small and nice place to be which we discover by mistake. We had tuna salad bagel and chicken bagel. Very good and nice looking. The bagels were a bit warm and soft. They also have different flavored bagels. The size is not that big so do …

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text:
My favourite, i love this place!!
The best bagels, coffee and lovely people.
Keep it up...

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: MY FAV BAGEL PLACE! I love the bagels here, especially the bagel with omelette. The blondies/brownies and juices are also very delicious. Wide variety of bagels to choose from, but be careful to go on time to have all the options.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text:
Great ambient, not too loud music. I tried the mozzarella +prosciutto and chicken avocado bagels. What a treat! The OJ is also great here. Nice staff and and main baker.
A+

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Great staff, nice ambience and great coffee but NO gluten free options for bagels or cakes so not coeliac friendly I’m afraid. Just saving people having to ask, and hope GF bagels will make an appearance.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Super friendly staff and amazing refills!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Best bagel we've had in a decade! I had the salmon cream cheese with capers and onions, and it filled a hole I never knew needed filling. My girlfriend had the tuna melt, and I quote: "well balanced filling on a crispy, yet soft bagel. A taste-sensation".

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Delicious bagels and coffee !

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Nice and friendly stuff, only problem is, like everywhere in Holland, if you want to use a toilet, you need to purchase something (  coffee or cake etc.).

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Visited here twice for breakfast during a 2 night stay in Amsterdam. On my first visit I had a poppy seed bagel with smoked salmon and cream cheese which was delicious. On my 2nd visit I had the biggest cinnamon bun I've ever had (it was …

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Hidden place. Great bagels and sweets. All so tasteful. The staff are so helpful and sweet. The owner does a good job. We have been coming here for 3 days now and are in love with this place :-)

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: I really like this place. Nice waitress, pretty place and amazing coffee and cake. Sure  I'll come back :)

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Tasty bagels and very nice people

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Best bagels in Amsterdam with friendly and welcoming service! You have to try the chive cream cheese

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Absolutely delicious bagels, would come every day if I lived nearby.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text:
Tastes like home!! NY
Perfect bagels!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: I love the bagels here! (To be fair, I’ve only ordered delivery and have not actually been to the restaurant). The bagels are soft and fresh. The ingredients are also very fresh and tasty. I usually get Tony’s Omelette on an Everything bagel and it is SOO good. The flavors are delicious!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: My favourite bagels in Amsterdam! There are many different types of bagels to choose from. The bagels are very fresh, great quality and always delicious. Their cream cheese with chives is delicious, I really recommend it!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: What a great place!!! delicious sweets, good coffee and great NY style bagels. We love it. Aslo the staff, so lovely and kind.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Very happy about the service and quality of the bagels! One of the few shops that maintains its high quality of service and food from year to year. Also like the no-nonsense approach to bagels (much more pure than Bagels&Beans). 5*  & Recommended!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: The staff forgot our order twice after we paid, then a while after asked why we were standing around, remembered they should be making our order, and then decided they didn’t actually have the stuff to make what we ordered, then very rudely …

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: The bagels are great compared to other Dutch bagel places, but the best part is the service. Great staff, very eager to please the customer.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Delicious food and coffee with plenty of vegan options (including 3 different vegan cakes to choose from!). Also lots of milk options for your coffee (e.g. oat, almond, soy, vegan chocolate milk).

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Great frozen bagels, super friendly staff. Highly recommend

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Very good place! Especially recommended the delicious lemon cake!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Absolutely love the bagels here. Super fresh and delicious. Great coffee too! Highly recommend stopping by here for breakfast, brunch, or a quick coffee break.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: We randomly got some bagels here today while on a walk. Wooooow. Shocked at how absolutely delicious they were. We’ve been constantly talking about them for the rest of the day haha Will go tomorrow to get some more!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Nive variety. Very polite service.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: I love this place. Excellent bagels, reasonable prices and the largest coffee portions in the city. This is becoming my new go to after class as it is consistent, reliable, cost effective, and delicious. I love the pastrami sandwich. While …

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: A review on the bagel alone— this is nothing like a thick, dense, chewy New York bagel. So if you’re going in thinking you’re going to get a New York bagel because of the name, think again. You’re getting an Amsterdam bagel which is a bit …

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Shockingly slow service for having 4 staff behind the bar.. and not very impressive hand hygiene. Won’t be coming back.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text:
My name is Tony too so i left 5 stars
+ it was really good and chill

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: No soap in the bathroom. Over priced for a bagel.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Lovely bagels and nice coffee with nice outside seating

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: I am not a bagel fan but I love the "everything bagel" with avocado and ckicken allthough I always ask for an extra topping of the advocado.  The cakes are great. 4 stars..why? They are so friendly and there is always fresh water with mint …

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Great food, good atmosphere 🤩

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Love their bagels and their coffee. The staff is very friendly. The other pastries are also very nice. Chocolate chip cookie is my favourite amongst the sweets. They also have WiFi. They offer free mint and lime aromatised water.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Good bagels and coffee with generous portions of cream cheese. One minor gripe is the lack of well-toasted bagel knowledge, but this place is generally well worth a daily stop in for breakfast. Their front patio is also a good place to watch the world go by.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Very delicious bagels, nice and welcoming staff

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Among all the other cafés in Amsterdam this one stands out for the rather excellent bagels. Available warm or cold with a variety of different breads and fillings. Seating is available outside of you can bear the ever present wind.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Although the menu itself isn't very large, the bagels are quite tasty and are relatively cheap. The inside is pretty big, and the service is nice and quick. If you're in a hurry and need a quick bite or are craving a bagel, this is the place to go.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Good coffee but  very simple and plain bagel tuna ...

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: I like this place. Great selection of bagels, no shortage of cream cheese (!), staff very friendly and they open early. I've been several times and I'll be back in the future no doubt.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text:
Best bagles I ate in Amsterdam. Cinnamon bun is amazing too.
Highly recommended.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Prices and bagels correct. Staff and service friendly. Did not try the pastries but looks pretty good. Bagels could be more tasty in my opinion though!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Great food & coffee. Visited multiple times on my vacation, staff were very quick. Also do excellent fresh juices would recommend banana juice.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: I've never loved a place more than I love this place. I tried the bagels, I tried cake, I tried a drink, it was all amazing. Would definitely go again.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Heaps of choice. Good bagels, lots of butter and jam. Coffee was great and service was excellent as well.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: 330 ml of water for 2.10 was a disappointment. The bagels are small...but good. Nice atmosphere and close to the shopping streets.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: The closest you can get to authentic bagels in Amsterdam. I'm not saying it's amazing, it's mediocre and does not hold a candle to bagels in NYC, but it's all you've got.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: What a find ! Simply delicious, around 15 euro for two coffees and two bagels - Wonderful combos and lovely friendly atmosphere. Definitely recommend

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Went here almost everyday for breakfast during our stay in the neighborhood. The food was prepared with very good tasty ingredients and the staff were lovely & accommodating.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Amazing bagel shop in Amsterdam. Plenty of options. Fully customizable. Good coffee. Good service. Would recommend.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Coffee and Bagel (with some topimgs) were good, but while the Coffee had a fair price, I think the bagel was a bit to expensive. ButeI will probably come back for a plain Bagel and top it myself

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Perfect place for a break in the city. Large choice of well prepared coffees and pastries. Cosy place and friendly staff. Good atmosphere inside. More american style than dutch but still a very good place.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Best cheesecake I've ever had and the staff was so cute and patient. Recommend to try their cheesecake and the bagels.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Nice cakes and good teas

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Nice service, good prices and excellent cakes.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Not an authentic Dutch destination, but I liked it. Wifi, friendly staff and great bagels. Good atmosphere for breakfast or a late lunch.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Good coffee,fresh bagels and friendly staff

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Delicious bagels!! and a good variety, too. kind staff, good service

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: They have tasty food options from bagels to just regular muffins, i love it

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Stopped here twice for breakfast while staying nearby. Bagels are excellent (which is saying something from a New Yorker) and the prices are reasonable.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Best Bagels in Amsterdam.  Good variety and choices. The coffee is good and the atmosphere welcoming

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text:
Awesome bagels. so good to have here in Amsterdam.
I wish they had bacon egg and cheese sandwiches available on the bagels!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Best bagels in Amsterdam!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Great coffee and very nice cakes. Try the Oatmeal Raisin Cookies, you won't be disappointed.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: A trusted place for good coffee, jummy bagels and good atmosphere. Don't forget to collect a stamp for a 10th muffin or coffee for free 😉.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Had some cakes and coffee. Cakes were ok, coffee was terrible. My flat white was basically warm milk.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Delicious bagels, friendly staff, and not too busy. Great place to stop by for a quick breakfast or lunch

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Good for quick breakfast

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Very nice place. Exactly what you are looking for when you walk in. Pastrami truffle sauce bagel was awesome.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: The food is great average pricing for downtown. Its a great place to people watch! Friendly service and fairly good espresso

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: The chicken avocado sandwich is delicious!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: The closest you can get to nyc bagels, probably. Still nowhere near but does the trick if you are craving. Service is super friendly.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: It’s a low bar, sure, but these are by far the best bagels in Amsterdam. 🥯🙌🏼

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Lovely little cosy coffee and bagel shop, coffee is great and the bagels are fantastic. Hash free zone

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Great bagels, nice cakes and good coffee too. Perfect for brunch.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: We had our first breakfast of our trip here and absolutely loved it we will be back tomorrow :)

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Not too expensive, but not cheap either. Good bagels and coffee

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: The best breakfast

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Great bagels and coffee, a nice change from the typical chain stores everywhere

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text:
crunchy on the outside, soft on the inside.
generous amounts of butter. good food in my tummy. hot coffee.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Filter coffee for 1,20 euro plus refill for 1 euro :-) I love it there.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Had the BLT. Was awesome. Forgot my coffee by accident and tiny bathroom but great coffee when I got it 😎.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Excellent specials and good staff. Also, try the cheesecake brownie, unique and delicious.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Nothing to brag about.  Rather Bagels 🥯 & Beans recommended for tuna melt bagel 🥯

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Best tuna melt bagel I ever had.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Nothing like a New York Bagel. Coffee was good!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Perfect!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Best service in Europe

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Great bagels, cakes and flavoured tap water :)

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Best food I've had since I've been in Europe.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Had breakfast there everyday when I was in Amsterdam! BLT was yummy yummy! 👍

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Great ambiance, great coffee, great bagels... All good !!!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Friendly service with a nice cup of coffee. Good start of your day!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: nice place nice bagels coffee just ok

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Bagels were fine, nice friendly service

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: I live the options they have for vegans. Not everyone cares about this topic!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: One out of the sweetiest córners in Amsterdam

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Very tasty short cake. Friendly staff nice location.

Review Text: The bagels are nice, however, the staff is extremely slow

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: It has WiFi. And the muffins taste good.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Amazing tastes, very friendly service, and creative combos of flavors!

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Prices could be a bit lower, but the food is quite good.

Name: Tony's New York City Bagels
Review Text: Great bagels!

Review Text: The onion bagel is worth a try!
